CustomField.description: Used as merge fields in email template
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( Account.IsPersonAccount, text(Account.Salutation)<>"" ), CASE(text(Account.Salutation), "Mr.", "Sehr geehrter Herr " + Account.LastName, "Mrs.", "Sehr geehrte Frau " + Account.LastName, "Ms.", "Sehr geehrte Frau " + Account.LastName, "Mme.", "Sehr geehrte Frau " + Account.LastName, "M.", "Sehr geehrter Herr " + Account.LastName, "Madame", "Sehr geehrte Frau " + Account.LastName, "Monsieur", "Sehr geehrter Herr " + Account.LastName, "1", "Sehr geehrter Herr " + Account.LastName, "2", "Sehr geehrte Frau " + Account.LastName, "3", "Sehr geehrte Frau, sehr geehrter Herr", "001", "Sehr geehrter Herr " + Account.LastName, "002", "Sehr geehrter Herren " + Account.LastName, "003", "Sehr geehrte Frau " + Account.LastName, "004", "Sehr geehrter Damen " + Account.LastName, "005", "Sehr geehrte Familie " + Account.LastName, "Mx", "Sehr geehrte Mx " + Account.LastName, "Prefer not to say", "Sehr geehrte " + Account.FirstName + " " + Account.LastName, ""), "Guten Tag " + Account.FirstName + " " + Account.LastName )
CustomField.label: Salutation Email DE
